title: opinions on this story of a funny game
body:
snowdown, and i dont know how we came to this, but our team was leo, blitz, janna, soraka, and some other support, intentional full support team
we rekt SO HARD EARLY ON, and after 10 mins we couldnt defend ourselves whatsoever, this was, a while ago. another question other than the title comment question, what other meme teams would u make

replies.body:
team deathbush needs more full ap moakai

and also the 'Immortal Irritators'
TOP {{champion:10}} JG {{champion:23}} MID {{champion:26}} ADC {{champion:203}} SUP {{champion:44}} 
just try to get a pentakill

-

a personal favourite the 'Vicious Venn'
TOP {{champion:3}} JG {{champion:20}}  MID {{champion:30}} ADC {{champion:85}} SUP {{champion:9}}
teamfights might not be a good idea

-

nobody stays calm among the 'Rampaging Rascals'
TOP {{champion:58}} JG {{champion:102}}  MID {{champion:63}}  ADC {{champion:150}} SUP {{champion:107}} 
don't piss these guys off

-

and I'm out of ideas again.

{{champion:81}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:30}} {{champion:22}} {{champion:119}}  global ultimate's team
{{champion:27}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:69}} {{champion:6}}  poison team
{{champion:111}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:412}}  {{champion:131}}{{champion:122}}   team GET OVER HERE
{{champion:33}} {{champion:120}} {{champion:91}} {{champion:23}} {{champion:27}}  Cant catch 
there are a few champs u can easy switch out in these team comps but this just gives u an idea.
Lots more meam teams aka Dunk Squad, yordle team, ect ct  all fun though.

What about the 'Gallivanting Gatecrashers'
TOP {{champion:98}} JG {{champion:56}} MID {{champion:80}} ADC {{champion:4}} SUP {{champion:223}} 
and you thought this would be a 1v1

-

or what about the 'Pet Pals'
TOP {{champion:83}} JG {{champion:60}} MID {{champion:90}} ADC {{champion:427}} SUP {{champion:1}}
not so fluffy

-

You could also have the 'Dastardly Doppelgangers'
TOP {{champion:62}} JG {{champion:82}} MID {{champion:7}} ADC{{champion:238}}  SUP {{champion:35}}
will you be deceived?

-

Another interesting comp would be the 'Multikill Masters'
TOP {{champion:84}} JG {{champion:11}}  MID {{champion:55}} ADC {{champion:18}} SUP {{champion:122}}
try not to die.

-

to be continued (maybe)

-

I can't think of anymore for now that could work as a semibalanced meta team, since I'd have to reuse champions to make a few other gameplay mechanic themes work and I already had to stretch things like ad tf and ad ivern and ad zed (I mean you could probably pull these off but they aren't really meta but it's really hard since adc's aren't as diverse as other roles).
there is a fair few team comps that u can make up alot more than what you and i have listed haha. just give a few a try and have fun...that is the idea isnt it... :P
